Regression model
```{r}
fitmodel<-lm(dist~speed, data=cars)
qqnorm(resid(fitmodel), main='normal Q-Q plot, fit_1', col='darkgreen')
qqline(resid(fitmodel), col='dodgerblue', lwd=2)
shapiro.test(cars$speed)
```
